casebody.data:
DUKE ENERGY CAROLINAS, LLC
v.
GRAY, et al. No. 108PA14-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 7, 2015. Debbie W. Harden, Meredith J. McKee, Charlotte, for Duke Energy Carolinas, LLC. Jackson R. Price, Charlotte. John R. Buric, Preston O. Odom, III, Charlotte, for Gray, Herbert A. Fred W. DeVore, III, Charlotte, for Builder Support Services of the Carolinas, Inc., et. al. Derek P. Adler. Erik M. Rosenwood, Charlotte, for Yarbrough-Williams & Houle, Inc. Mark R. Kutny, Charlotte. Lawrence J. Goldman, Charlotte, for Lucas-Forman, Inc. Gregory W. Brown, Raleigh, for Carter Land Surveyors & Planners, Inc. Kristi L. Gavalier, Raleigh. Matthew D. Rhoad, Davis F. Roach, Raleigh, for Piedmont Natural Gas Company, Inc., et. al. Joseph W. Eason, D. Martin Warf, Raleigh, for N.C. Electric Membership Corporation, et. al. Kimberly S. Hibbard, General Counsel, for N.C. League of Municipalities. Gregory F. Schwitzgebel, III, Associate General Counsel, Daniel F. McLawhorn, Associate City Attorney, for N.C. League of Municipalities.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of August 2015 by Appellee:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of August 2015."

Appellee shall have up to and including the 3rd day of September 2015 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
